qas.question: What do the dialects of Catalan feature?
In comparison to what are the dialects uniform?
What is the percentage of intelligibility between dialects?
What dialect is the exception to intelligibility?

context: The dialects of the Catalan language feature a relative <a0_0>uniformity<a0_0/>, especially when compared to <a1_0>other Romance languages<a1_0/>; both in terms of vocabulary, semantics, syntax, morphology, and phonology. Mutual <a2_0>intelligibility<a2_0/> between dialects is very high, estimates ranging from <a3_0>90% to 95%<a3_0/>. The only exception is the isolated idiosyncratic <a4_0>Alguerese<a4_0/> dialect.
